SEARCH
Module help
Package help

Class ManagerProductController

java.lang.Object
help.ManagerProductController
public class ManagerProductController extends Object
Controller class for managing products in the system. This class provides the functionality for adding, updating, and removing products.

  • Method Details

    • handleCloseButtonAction

      private void handleCloseButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the close button action. Closes the current window when the close button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the Close button click.

    • handleMinimizeButtonAction

      private void handleMinimizeButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the minimize button action. Minimizes the current window when the minimize button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the Minimize button click.

    • handleSignOutButtonAction

      private void handleSignOutButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the sign out button action. Clears the shopping cart, loads the login page, and sets it as the current scene.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the Sign Out button click.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller, setting up the table, combo boxes, buttons, and loading the product data.

    • setupTableColumns

      private void setupTableColumns()
      Sets up the table columns for the product list, including cell value factories, column widths, and formatting.

    • setupComboBox

      private void setupComboBox()
      Sets up the combo box for product type selection with predefined values.

    • setupButtons

      private void setupButtons()
      Sets up button actions for the UI components, including close, minimize, import, and menu navigation.

    • handleClose

      private void handleClose()
      Closes the current window.

    • handleMinimize

      private void handleMinimize()
      Minimizes the current window.

    • handleImportImage

      private void handleImportImage() throws Exception
      Handles the import image action. Allows the user to select an image file and updates the selected product's image.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while handling the image import.

    • loadProducts

      private void loadProducts()
      Loads products from the database and populates the ProductTable with them. It also logs the details of each product for debugging purposes.

    • showProductDetails

      private void showProductDetails(Product product)
      Displays the details of the selected product in the relevant UI fields.
      Parameters:
      product - The product whose details need to be displayed.

    • handleAddProduct

      private void handleAddProduct()
      Handles the action of adding a new product to the database. Validates inputs, creates a new product object, and attempts to insert it into the database. If successful, the product list is refreshed, and input fields are cleared.

    • handleUpdateProduct

      private void handleUpdateProduct()
      Handles the action of updating an existing product in the database. Validates inputs, retrieves the selected product, creates an updated product object, and attempts to update the product in the database. If successful, the product list is refreshed, and input fields are cleared.

    • handleDeleteProduct

      private void handleDeleteProduct()
      Handles the action of deleting a selected product from the database. Displays a confirmation dialog before proceeding with the deletion. If the deletion is successful, the product list is refreshed.

    • validateInputs

      private boolean validateInputs()
      Validates the inputs for adding or updating a product. Checks if the product name, stock, price, and product type are valid.
      Returns:
      true if all inputs are valid, false otherwise.

    • clearFields

      private void clearFields()
      Clears all input fields for product management. This includes clearing the product name, stock, price, type, and image data fields.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String content)
      Displays an alert dialog with a specified type, title, and message content. The alert is modal to the primary application window and ensures it appears within the same window context. If the primary application window is in fullscreen, the alert retains this state.
      Parameters:
      alertType - The type of alert to display (e.g., INFORMATION, WARNING, ERROR).
      title - The title of the alert dialog, displayed in the dialog's title bar.
      content - The message content to be displayed in the alert dialog.

    • handleProductManagement

      private void handleProductManagement()
      Handles the action of navigating to the product management page. Loads the corresponding FXML file and sets it as the root of the current scene. Ensures the stage remains in fullscreen mode.

    • handlePersonnelManagement

      private void handlePersonnelManagement()
      Handles the action of navigating to the personnel management page. Loads the corresponding FXML file and sets it as the root of the current scene. Ensures the stage remains in fullscreen mode.

    • handlePriceManagement

      private void handlePriceManagement()
      Handles the action of navigating to the price management page. Loads the corresponding FXML file and sets it as the root of the current scene. Ensures the stage remains in fullscreen mode.

    • handleRevenueTax

      private void handleRevenueTax()
      Handles the action of navigating to the revenue and tax management page. Loads the corresponding FXML file and sets it as the root of the current scene. Ensures the stage remains in fullscreen mode.
